metadata.title: CVE-2017-8287 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
FreeType 2 before 2017-03-26 has an out-of-bounds write caused by aheap-based buffer overflow related to the t1_builder_close_contour functionin psaux/psobjs.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.3
libfreetype6 - 2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.3').
